question: This programme aims to promote entrepreneurship, create world-class innovation hubs and solve problems through grand challenges in the country. This programme has the target of being a techno-financial, incubation and facilitation program to support all aspects of start-up businesses and self-employment activities, particularly in technology driven areas. The name of the programme is _?
explanation: SETU stands for Self-Employment and Talent Utilisation. It aims to promote entrepreneurship, create innovation hubs and solve problems through Grand Challenges. This programme has the target of being a techno-financial, incubation and facilitation program to support all aspects of start-up businesses and self-employment activities, particularly in technology driven areas.
